trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> is interrupted while it is in a waiting state.
trans-unit.target: Unntak forårsakes når en <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref> blir avbrutt mens den er i ventende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: After a thread is created, it is in one or more <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> states until it is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Når en tråd er opprettet, er det i ett eller flere <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>angir før den er ødelagt.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A> when a thread is in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> state will cause a ThreadInterruptedException to be thrown in the target thread.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A>når en tråd er i den <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>tilstand vil føre til at en ThreadInterruptedException til å bli utløst i måltråden.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the thread is not in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> state, the exception is not thrown until the thread enters that state.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tråden ikke er i den <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>tilstand, den ikke unntak før tråden går inn i denne tilstanden.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>

trans-unit.source: If the thread never blocks, it could complete without ever being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tråden blokkerer aldri, kan det fullføre uten noen gang blir avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: ThreadInterruptedException uses the HRESULT COR_E_THREADINTERRUPTED, which has the value 0x80131519.
trans-unit.target: ThreadInterruptedException bruker HRESULT COR_E_THREADINTERRUPTED, som har verdien 0x80131519.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of ThreadInterruptedException, see the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av ThreadInterruptedException, kan du se den <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException.%23ctor%2A>konstruktører.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"> </xref> klasse standardegenskapene.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`.| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Lokaliserte feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`.| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"> </xref> klasse serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles under deserialisering til reconstitute unntak objektet overføres via en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [XML og SOAP-serialisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som inneholder den serialiserte objektdata om som oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som inneholder kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding og en referanse til det interne unntaket er årsaken til dette unntaket.

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak som er registrert som en direkte resultatet av et tidligere unntak må inkludere en referanse til det tidligere unntaket i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen returnerer den samme verdien som er sendt til konstruktøren, eller `null` hvis den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen leverer ikke internt unntak verdien til konstruktøren.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| Referansen for det indre unntaket. | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `innerException` -parameteren er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det gjeldende unntaket i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref> blokken som behandler det interne unntaket.
